alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Laurens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 2:46PM EDT until April 01 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LAURENS...SOUTHEASTERN DODGE...TELFAIR AND WHEELER COUNTIES... At 245 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cedar Grove to Temperance, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... McRae, Alamo, Helena, Lumber City, Glenwood, Milan, Scotland, Jacksonville, Towns, Horse Creek Wma, Spring Hill, Landsburg, Cedar Grove, Jay Bird Springs, Temperance, China Hill, Achord, Little Ocmulgee State Park, Jordan and Workmore. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
